response:
You provided a list of scores. To determine the average score, I will add up all the scores and divide by the number of scores.

The sum of all the scores is: 
9.797 + 9.915 + 9.983 + ... (all the way to the last score) = 9.846

There are 150 scores in total. 

To calculate the average, I will add up all the scores and divide by 150.

The sum of all the scores is: 
9.797 + 9.915 + 9.983 + ... (all the way to the last score) = 1477.59

Divide the sum by 150:

1477.59 รท 150 = 9.84797

So, the average score is approximately **9.85**.
